backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing authentication, access control, label configs, printers, counters, logs, and print operations with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by removing v72LabelKey while preserving all other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, setup, and production deployment steps for the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining base styles, theming variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, navigation tabs, wake lock status, and printer context providers.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen handling password auth, backend health polling, error states, and auto-retry logic.
frontend/src/contexts/PrintProtocolConte: Context provider storing and updating the active print protocol selection.
WebUSB printer context managing device connection, interface claiming, errors, and CPCL command sending.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored sessions, status flags, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for authentication, health checks, printers, profiles, and other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Custom hook requesting and maintaining a screen wake lock with auto-reacquisition and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables, dark theme overrides, and touch‑optimized styles for tablets and coarse pointers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Devices.tsx: Manages printer devices including USB connect/disconnect, protocol selection, and sending CPCL test prints.
frontend/src/pages/Diagnostics.tsx: Displays scan/print statistics, recent print history, and allows exporting diagnostics as CSV.
frontend/src/pages/LabelSettings.tsx: Provides UI for editing label layout settings, previewing results, and managing valid prefixes and title mappings.
frontend/src/pages/ScanPrint.tsx: Handles barcode scanning, validation, serial pairing, and printing labels via USB or backend printers.
frontend/src/types/webusb.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for the WebUSB API, covering devices, interfaces, endpoints, and transfer operations.
frontend/src/utils/cpclTemplates.ts: Provides CPCL label generation utilities, including test prints and dual-serial label creation using unified layout calculations.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Classifies Internet Computer errors and produces user-friendly messages for stopped canisters, network issues, auth failures, and config errors.
frontend/src/utils/labelLayoutModel.ts: Defines unified label layout calculations for barcodes, text, and titles, producing exact CPCL/preview coordinates based on config.
Renders Code128 barcodes and full dual‑serial label previews on canvas using the unified layout model for CPCL-accurate output.
frontend/src/utils/scannerOnlyInput.ts: Detects fast scanner keystroke patterns, blocks paste/drop, and normalizes scanned text for reliable scanner-only input handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and session-stored parameters for routing, persistence, and secure cleanup of sensitive values from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended components (container, radii, shadows), and accordion animations, and enables typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s current project state, including version, architecture notes for the IC-backed barcode/label system, and a list of known issues in both frontend and backend.
